SA05n884:1: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparamparānabhilāpyānabhilāpya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotyamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
SA05n884:2: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ |
SA05n884:3: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ || 1 ||
SA05n884:9: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān || 4 ||
SA05n884:11: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi || 5 ||
SA05n884:14: yā ca anuttarapūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām |
SA05n884:16: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena |
SA05n884:17: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam || 8 ||
SA05n884:18: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām |
SA05n884:19: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam || 9 ||
SA05n884:20: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṃgataprāptāḥ |
SA05n884:21: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthān cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai || 10 ||
SA05n884:25: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam || 12 ||
SA05n884:26: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśaddiśi loke |
SA05n884:27: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ || 13 ||
SA05n884:28: yāvata keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ |
SA05n884:30: yāvata keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitā sada bhontu arogāḥ |
SA05n884:31: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśāḥ || 15 ||
SA05n884:32: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu |
SA05n884:33: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā || 16 ||
SA05n884:37: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam || 18 ||
SA05n884:38: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu na jātu vimuhyet |
SA05n884:39: ye'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇāyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam || 19 ||
SA05n884:40: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam |
SA05n884:41: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūryaśaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ || 20 ||
SA05n884:42: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ |
SA05n884:43: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu || 21 ||
SA05n884:45: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam || 22 ||
SA05n884:46: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā |
SA05n884:47: kāyatu vācatu cetanato cā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam || 23 ||
SA05n884:48: ye'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ |
SA05n884:49: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu || 24 ||
SA05n884:50: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān |
SA05n884:51: teṣu ca pūja kareyu udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ || 25 ||
SA05n884:53: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam || 26 ||
SA05n884:54: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃcaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ |
SA05n884:56: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiyabuddhān |
SA05n884:57: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ || 28 ||
SA05n884:65: ye'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam || 32 ||
SA05n884:66: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena |
SA05n884:67: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena || 33 ||
SA05n884:70: ye ca anāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim |
SA05n884:71: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān || 35 ||
SA05n884:77: mārabalaṃ abalaṃ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadracarībala sarvān || 38 ||
SA05n884:83: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣāt bhadracarīya bibudhyiya bodhim || 41 ||
SA05n884:84: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ |
SA05n884:85: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam || 42 ||
SA05n884:87: yādṛśanāmana bhadravidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena || 43 ||
SA05n884:89: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām || 44 ||
SA05n884:90: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām |
SA05n884:91: apramāṇu cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām || 45 ||
SA05n884:92: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva |
SA05n884:93: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam || 46 ||
SA05n884:94: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām |
SA05n884:95: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam || 47 ||
SA05n884:98: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ |
SA05n884:99: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracari praṇidhānam || 49 ||
SA05n884:100: lābha sulabdha sajīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣajanma |
SA05n884:101: yādṛśu so hi samantatabhadraste'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti || 50 ||
SA05n884:102: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni |
SA05n884:103: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam || 51 ||
SA05n884:104: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirūpetaḥ |
SA05n884:106: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya |
SA05n884:107: buddhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam || 53 ||
SA05n884:108: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā |
SA05n884:109: buddhavijānati yo'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha || 54 ||
SA05n884:110: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva |
SA05n884:111: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam || 55 ||
SA05n884:113: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī vara bhadracarīye || 56 ||
SA05n884:114: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān |
SA05n884:115: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam || 57 ||
SA05n884:116: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā |
SA05n884:117: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kariyāvata loke || 58 ||
SA05n884:118: tahi jinamaṃḍali śobhaniramye padmavare rūcire upapannaḥ |
SA05n884:119: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato amitābhajinasya || 59 ||
SA05n884:120: vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita koṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ |
SA05n884:121: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena || 60 ||
SA05n884:122: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit |
SA05n884:123: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam || 61 ||
